channel.title: Moparscape client
channel.description:
how can i block moparscape client?
sick of getting nulls on my server: Connection accepted from 69.2.207.7: 49604.
and i trace moparisthebest.com (client)
[code]tracing route to moparisthebest.com [69.2.207.7] 1 32 ms 23 ms 22 ms ge-1-1-0-1100.tinqu1.ip.tele.dk [87.55.64.33] 2 23 ms 23 ms 22 ms ge-1-0-0.1000M.lmvnqu1.ip.tele.dk [83.88.30.70]
3 23 ms 24 ms 24 ms ge-0-0-0.1000M.strnqu1.ip.tele.dk [83.88.30.66]
4 24 ms 25 ms 24 ms ge3-0.1000M.hrnxg4.ip.tele.dk [83.88.13.150] 5 126 ms 125 ms 125 ms pos0-0-5-1-2488M.arcnqh1.ip.tele.dk [83.88.20.21 ] 6 124 ms 124 ms 125 ms pos0-2-0-0-10G.boanqh1.ip.tele.dk [83.88.27.17]
7 124 ms 125 ms 124 ms pos7-0-0-10G.nyk2nxg2.ip.tele.dk [83.88.26.106]
8 127 ms 124 ms 124 ms NYCL-PEER-03.twtelecom.net [198.32.118.36] 9 151 ms 152 ms 156 ms 199.227.5.6 10 151 ms 152 ms 152 ms 199.227.5.6 11 152 ms 151 ms 151 ms v10.ld1.lou.peak10.net [216.26.190.1] 12 151 ms 151 ms 151 ms eth1-9.f-ld1.lou.peak10.net [216.26.190.130] 13 152 ms 161 ms 153 ms barracuda.doeanderson.com [69.2.207.7]
tracing complete.[/code]

item.title: Moparscape client
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

^ SYI and NULLERS are only programms , yes.

Moparscape “CLIENT” is a harmless programm which lets people play moparscape.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape client
item.dc:creator: @Kryptick Kryptick
item.description:
@Kryptick wrote:

Its not the moparscape client thats creating nulls in your server, its people attacking it with flooding software.
Why don’t you take preventative measures and separate flooders from actual players by keeping track of how many connections exist per host and deny any hosts that exceed the limit.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape client
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

block mopar client as in unable to acces it from ur computer? well go star -->run—>cmd it will come up wid a black box then type ipconfig then “enter” it will say a default gateway type those numbers in address bar then “enter”. u’ll have to enter a username and pass depending on ur router it cud be admin and admin or admin and no pass or username and no pass im not sure. when u get it u’ll be taken to a page abut ur router. search for filter or sufin like dat then go disable and put in moparscape client link. =p and save lol easy enuf

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape client
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

You can only not allow OTHER clients if you got ur own client.

But why would you block mopar CLIENT ? Lol it’s just a client which allowed people 2 play moparscape. wdf.

Read full topic
